about:
I am a medical doctor in Amsterdam and for many years I traveled in the Far East, for fun and business. At one of this trips, i was on a business conference in Bali, an instant love came over me, for this Island and inhabitants. And now I can share this feeling with you in my enchanting villa "VILLA KELAPA". The Balinese people, design, religion and culture are extremely unique, in every detail. I hope you appreciate my Balinese staff as much as I do, and I wish you to feel at home ! 

If you have any wishes to make your stay comfortable and careless, let me know, and I will take care, and my English spoken staff will also be happy to have you as my special guest, so my home is your home.

To inform you when you are traveling in Europe, I also can recommend you the beautiful city of Amsterdam, Holland .

I am the host of Amsterdam Canal Apartments as well, and there is the same welcoming atmosphere in the two apartments (overlooking the canals) as in my villa, VILLA KELAPA, Bali.

review.comments: We (a family of 4, two kids – 4 months and 2 years old) had a great time at Villa Kelapa. Everything looked like the pictures. The staff did an amazing job and the food was delicious. The Villa is very child-friendly and the location is close to a lot of restaurants. We can only recommend staying there.

school: Gymnasium B RS Westfriesland, Geneeskunde Vrije Universiteit
